html:
Fresh deals are plentiful for the start of June, with Apple's M4 MacBook Air dipping to $837, while the Samsung M8 monitor is back on sale for $399.99.

Amazon has issued June discounts on the 13-inch MacBook Air M4, with prices falling to as low as $837.19. Here's a rundown of the sale:

Today's MacBook Air sale

  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $837.19 ($162 off)
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,001.76 ($198 off)
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,178.14 ($221 off)
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 256GB SSD) in Starlight: $1,011.45 ($188 off)
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,212.76 ($187 off)
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,338.62 ($261 off)

Samsung M8 monitor drops to $399.99

Save $300 on the Samsung M8 monitor.

Samsung.com, meanwhile, is having a sale this week, with the 32-inch M8 4K display on sale for $399.99. This reflects a 43% price cut off retail for the smart monitor that has USB-C, HDMI, and USB-A ports to pair with your MacBook Pro or MacBook Air.

Buy M8 for $399.99
